{{Description|Legend has it that during a disaster hundreds of years ago, Shigeyori Kujou, a mortal general whom Her Highness valued greatly, built a battlefront fortress in one night and fought valiantly against the forces of darkness, flying the banner of the Electro Mitsudomoe high. Hundreds of years later, the descendants of the [[Kujou Clan|Kujou family]] have also inherited outstanding military engineering skills.|[[Archive]]}}
